other_tests.findings: Post ERCP, the patient's pain resolved.

findings.lower_chest: Small left-sided simple pleural effusion and trace right-sided pleural effusion likely present.

hepatobiliary.liver: Homogenous attenuation, no focal lesions, no biliary dilatation.
hepatobiliary.gallbladder: Contains gallstones without wall thickening or surrounding inflammation, small focus of air and pneumobilia expected post ERCP.

abdominal.pancreas: Normal attenuation, no focal lesions or ductal dilatation.
abdominal.urinary: Normal and symmetric kidneys, no focal lesions or hydronephrosis.

gastrointestinal.duodenum: Significant fat stranding along proximal and mid portion.
gastrointestinal.pelvis: Small free fluid, no free air. Colon and rectum normal.

abdominal.pelvic: Urinary bladder and distal ureters unremarkable.
abdominal.lymph_nodes: Reactive lymph nodes in mesentery, no pelvic or inguinal lymphadenopathy.
abdominal.vascular: No abdominal aortic aneurysm or significant atherosclerotic disease.
abdominal.bones: No worrisome osseous lesions or acute fractures.
abdominal.soft_tissues: Abdominal and pelvic wall within normal limits.
